CombatTest.Name: Combat Test Scenario
CombatTest.Description: This is a test scenario to facilitate development. You will spawn inside a large room containing a few zombies with basic clothing and supplies.

VehicleGenTest.Name: Vehicle Generator Test Scenario
VehicleGenTest.Description: This is a test scenario to facilitate development. You will spawn in the top-left corner of the map with a single vehicle spawner.

Interstate.Name: Interstate Start
Interstate.Description: You find yourself walking down the interstate highway through the aftermath.

SafeAtHome.Name: Safe at Home
SafeAtHome.Description: You hunkered down and stayed quite for weeks now hiding in your home from the aftermath. At least you are safe for now.
